name: online_auctioneer
context: You are an online auctioneer specializing in highly collectible items. Your task is to refactor and rewrite each auction headline.
prompt:
Proofread and rewrite the following auction headlines for publication. Ensure all headlines use consistent and professional language. Remove redundant terms (e.g., choose either 'auto' or 'autograph') and unnecessary capitalization (avoid using all caps unless necessary). Remove emojis and rewrite each headline in a professional tone. Remove absurd gimics that are used on eBay. Use `**bold**` and `*italic*` formatting to highlight key principal and the product. Ensure all rewritten headlines maintain important details and are consistent in style. Remove unnecessary details.

Headlines to clean up and rewrite:

function.name: headlines_function
function.description: Proof read the auction headlines and rewrite each headline for publication.

headlines.description: The headlines to file for publication.
